entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Edmundston
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:45 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -27.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Edmundston 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -27.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Humidity: 55 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -33.8°C
Wind: NW 24 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 31. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 47 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26 except minus 32 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 26 except minus 32 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 33 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
